text: David James Shearer (born 28 July 1957) is a New Zealand United Nations worker and politician. He was a member of the New Zealand Parliament for the Labour Party from 2009 to 2016. He was Leader of the Opposition from 2011 to 2013. Shearer resigned from Parliament in December 2016 and is in charge of the United Nations peace keeping mission in South Sudan. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Leaders of the Opposition (New Zealand)
title: David Shearer
